answers: I am Faizan Shaikh, a Sr. Technical Lead with over 13 years of experience in software development. My expertise lies in full-stack application development, Generative AI, and Azure cloud services. I specialize in creating scalable, efficient applications and implementing robust CI/CD pipelines.

answers: I have expertise in .NET Core, Angular, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and databases like SQL Server and MongoDB. I am also skilled in cloud services such as Azure and AWS, particularly in Azure OpenAI, Logic Apps, and Function Apps.

answers: One of my recent projects involved developing a chatbot using Azure OpenAI for a SaaS application. The chatbot included NLP search capabilities and a retrieval-augmented generation feature. I also created a document translator and summarizer using Azure Logic Apps and OpenAI.

My past roles include Technical Lead at Orion Innovation, Senior Software Developer at Duff & Phelps, and various other roles at Sure Prep, Fox Solutions, and Winjit Technologies.

answers: One of my key projects was developing the Acuity Portal for software and service management. I led the design and implementation of a chatbot with software consumption logs and developed a contract document translator using Azure AI services. Another significant project was the RegSamart ChatBot, which integrated a custom knowledge base of FDA guidance documents for efficient regulatory management.
